strong.span: ALL SCHOOL ACTIVITIES HAVE BEEN CANCELLED FOR THE REMAINDER OF THE SCHOOL YEAR

img.alt: Cambios en el programa de almuerzo a partir del 17 de abril

div.h3: Cambios en el programa de almuerzo a partir del 17 de abril
div.div: A partir del viernes 17 de abril, el programa de alimentación escolar cambiará un poco. Todavía vamos a enviar comidas de lunes a viernes. Pero solo vamos a repartir comidas los martes y . . .

a.aria-label: Full Article For Cambios en el programa de almuerzo a partir del 17 de abril
Source Information For Cambios en el programa de almuerzo a partir del 17 de abril

img.alt: Changes to Lunch Program Effective April 17

div.h3: Changes to Lunch Program Effective April 17
div.div: Starting Friday April 17 the school food program is going to change a little. We are still going to be sending out meals for Monday through Friday. But we are only going to be handing out meals on . . .

a.aria-label: Full Article For Changes to Lunch Program Effective April 17
Source Information For Changes to Lunch Program Effective April 17

img.alt: 13 de abril Actualización del Departamento de Salud del Condado de Stanton

div.h3: 13 de abril Actualización del Departamento de Salud del Condado de Stanton
div.div: nd positivo case of COVID. Todos los contactos cercanos están siendo notificados. No se enviará un comunicado de prensa con cada nuevo caso. Sin embargo, los de Civic Ready serán notificados de . . .

a.aria-label: Full Article For 13 de abril Actualización del Departamento de Salud del Condado de Stanton
Source Information For 13 de abril Actualización del Departamento de Salud del Condado de Stanton

img.alt: April 13th Update from Stanton County Health Department

div.h3: April 13th Update from Stanton County Health Department
div.div: There is a 2nd positive case of COVID in Stanton County. All close contacts are being notified. A news release will not be sent out with each new case. However those on Civic Ready will be notified . . .

a.aria-label: Full Article For April 13th Update from Stanton County Health Department
Source Information For April 13th Update from Stanton County Health Department

img.alt: Primer caso de enfermedad por coronavirus (COVID-19) identificado en el condado de Stanton

div.h3: Primer caso de enfermedad por coronavirus (COVID-19) identificado en el condado de Stanton
div.div: Johnson City, KS - El Departamento de Salud del Condado de Stanton está anunciando el primer caso de enfermedad por coronavirus (COVID-19) en el Condado de Stanton. . . .

a.aria-label: Full Article For Primer caso de enfermedad por coronavirus (COVID-19) identificado en el condado de Stanton
Source Information For Primer caso de enfermedad por coronavirus (COVID-19) identificado en el condado de Stanton

img.alt: First case of coronavirus disease (COVID-19) identified in Stanton County

div.h3: First case of coronavirus disease (COVID-19) identified in Stanton County
div.div: Johnson City, KS – Stanton County Health Department is announcing the first case of coronavirus disease (COVID-19) in Stanton County. . . .

a.aria-label: Full Article For First case of coronavirus disease (COVID-19) identified in Stanton County
Source Information For First case of coronavirus disease (COVID-19) identified in Stanton County

strong.font: Parents, please be sure to sign up for the Enotes- District Alerts.

span.font: Sign up is on the left side of the page below the Upcoming Events. Please sign up using your cell number for text alerts, they will be sent first. Please include the area code but DO NOT use dashes or dots between numbers.

span.span: The company says that Internet Explorer doesn’t always work so you might try signing up with Google Chrome, Firefox, Safari, etc.

strong.font: Email will be an optional mode of delivery.
